WorkshopItemInfo.Name: awp_india (1.6)
WorkshopItemInfo.Description:
The 1.6 version of awp_india, ported to [i]Holdfast: Nations at War[/i]!
awp_india is an aim map for 1.6 - it was originally designed and released by bobo (Johan Fasting). Its simplicity saw it being replicated across all major Counter-Strike versions.
Supports Army Battlefield, Army Assault, and Melee Arena. Perfect for a lobby map. Sappers will be unable to build on this map due to the lack of terrain.
[url=https://tsarvar.com/en/maps/counter-strike-1.6/awp_india]awp_india map courtesy of bobo (Johan Fasting).[/url] Ported to Holdfast by Spammy McJunkmail.
Part of the 87th's Counter-Strike: Holdfast Offensive collection. Join us today - https://discord.gg/dakvCACDSF
[h3]Latest Update - v. 1.0.2[/h3] - Added workshop icon - Added loading screen and spawn menu images
